name: Delivery Duel
description:
There can only be one postman in this town! All shots are allowed to deliver more mail than your opponent: steal his mail and launch missiles without hesitating.

A local competitive 2-player game.

Play online or on PC. Play with 2 gamepads, or with a keyboard and a gamepad. Controls: Left stick & X or WASD and E.

Made in 48h by Thomas Bringer for CStudio Game Jam 2023 (Theme: Oppositions and Dualities)

Credits:

Kenney for art assets,

marserMD & Maiami Studio for VFX,

Vexento - Neon for soundtrack,

OpenGameArt.org for SFX
